subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Bolt and Gatlin, who have neither raced each other nor lost in their trademark sprints since 2013, both won their 100-meter heats Saturday at the world championships in Beijing.
snippet: Bolt and Gatlin, who have neither raced each other nor lost in their trademark sprints since 2013, both won their 100-meter heats Saturday at the world championships in Beijing.
